content.raw: In the Advance Robotics department in Italian Institut of Technology we are developing Humanoid Robots with elastic joints and we would like to describe them with URDF and maybe also simulate them in GAZEBO. For this reason we are interested in this issues :)
content.html: In the Advance Robotics department in Italian Institut of Technology we are developing Humanoid Robots with elastic joints and we would like to describe them with URDF and maybe also simulate them in GAZEBO. For this reason we are interested in this issues :)
